mapper.select: SELECT s.store_id , a.address address , ci.city city , co.country country , st.first_name firstName , st.last_name lastName , st.email email , ad.phone phone FROM store s JOIN address a ON s.address_id = a.address_id JOIN city ci ON a.city_id = ci.city_id JOIN country co ON ci.country_id = co.country_id JOIN staff st ON s.store_id = st.store_id JOIN address ad ON st.address_id = ad.address_id ORDER BY s.store_id;
